tasks.task_description: Create new documentation file for custom transformations
Write compelling introduction emphasizing generators over streams
Add parsing/validation example with error handling
Add guidelines section on when to use each approach
Update SUMMARY.md to include new section

description: Create comprehensive documentation for custom transformations using async generators
context: Created comprehensive custom transformations documentation with compelling introduction, practical examples (batching, stateful processing, parsing/validation, rate limiting, multi-stage), side-by-side comparison, guidelines, and best practices. File created at site/src/iterables/custom-transformations.md
Updated SUMMARY.md to include the new Custom Transformations section in the Async Iterables chapter

All tests are now passing! Created comprehensive tests for all custom transformation examples including batching, running average, JSON parsing, throttling, multi-stage processing, and best practices. Fixed case-sensitivity issue in severity detection. All 173 tests pass.
